entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Niagara Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:39 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 02:00 AM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -3.3°C
Pressure: 101.7 kPa
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -3.9°C
Wind: W 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
